sentence.text: In vitro evaluation of metabolic drug-drug interactions: a descriptive and critical commentary.
Adverse drug-drug interactions represent a major challenge for the pharmaceutical industry
Recently, in vitro approaches for the evaluation of metabolism-related drug-drug interactions have been developed

These in vitro approaches are found to be useful in the assessment of clinical drug-drug interaction potential of new chemical entities and to aid the understanding of clinically significant drug-drug interactions observed with existing drugs
The general methods for the evaluation of drug-drug interactions using in vitro, human-based experimental systems are described and critically reviewed
